sentences.en: Sturgeon fishing has been pretty good in the estuary.
sentences.cn: 鲟鱼捕捞在这个河口一直很好。

sentences.en: A huge variety of fish, including cod, bream, mussels, salmon and sturgeon, is being farmed, providing food for people all over the world.
sentences.cn: 非常多的鱼类已被养殖，包括鳕鱼、鲤科鱼、贻贝、鲑鱼和鲟鱼，为世界各地的人们提供了食物。

sentences.en: Fishermen catchas many as 3, 000 sturgeon by mistake every year.
sentences.cn: 渔民每年错误地捕捞大概3000头中华鲟。
